urls.title: Flood and Coastal Engineering | Brunel University London
urls.description: This exciting new funded programme, developed in partnership with the Environment Agency will equip you with the knowledge you need for a successful career in flood risk management.

text:
Take your knowledge further with a Flood and Coastal Engineering MSc. 

Scholarships are available, full time for one year starting in September 2021 and will include a 3 month work placement at the @EnvAgency (subject to terms and conditions).

Apply now: https://t.co/qatD7dFz4V https://t.co/ND6jpoNHTM

text: @Feargal_Sharkey @mrfly @UnaPaloma @CanalRiverTrust @ChrisGPackham @LeeValleyPark @haringeycouncil @EnvAgency @thameswater Interestingly, in a recent Information Request reply back from Thames Water, the only Combined Sewer Overflow to spill to the entire Lea over the week in question was to the Olympic Park. That seems unlikely, but we'll see as other replies come back.
